ygData.subject: Re: Latest nerf
ygData.msgSnippet: No if they took away a wizzies fast casting DD spells and replaced them all with DD like an enchanters, or took away a magicians ability to summon a pet, these
ygData.messageBody:
No if they took away a wizzies fast casting DD spells and replaced them
all with DD like an enchanters, or took away a magicians ability to
summon a pet, these are the sort of nerfs that are unacceptable, necros
and charm was never a very good mix (hell by the time they got it they
could use it for about 4 levels before the mobs were immune to it)
Enchanters are *the* charming class, and share Fear line with necros
nerfing the necros fear was a bad thing too. don't mess with the class
core abilities, it really irks people off!
